title: After My Death, The Villain Blackened Again - Novel Updates

description:
Bound to the ‘enthralling tens of thousands system,’ Yan Ge thought she would enthrall all living things and become a tree-born winner.

She never thought that the Big Boss she helped out would keep on blackening.>
